law.catch_line: In Part II of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In Part II of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the State Board of Victim Services.

section.section: "Crime" does not include a violation of the Transportation Article that is not punishable by a term of confinement.

text.section: "Executive Director" means the Executive Director of the Governor's Office of Crime Control and Prevention.
"Fund" means the State Victims of Crime Fund.

section.section: "Victim" means a person who suffers direct or threatened physical, emotional, or financial harm as a direct result of a crime or of a violation of § 21-902 of the Transportation Article.
"Victim" includes a family member of a minor, incompetent, or homicide victim.
